models.descriptionModel: The Ford Motor Company (also known as simply Ford) is an American multinational automaker headquartered in Dearborn, Michigan, a suburb of Detroit. It was founded by Henry Ford and incorporated on June 16, 1903. The company sells automobiles and commercial vehicles under the Ford brand and most luxury cars under the Lincoln brand. Ford also owns Brazilian SUV manufacturer, Troller, and Australian performance car manufacturer FPV. In the past it has also produced tractors and automotive components.
reviewsBrand: I find the interior design lacking badly. Trying to reach the pull down on the steering wheel is next to impossible. No power adjustment for the passenger seat is not a positive as is the missing rear camera I thought would be on all vehicles by now.
Purchased 2014 Fusion SE in June. Have been happy with vehicle- stylish looks, quiet ride, excellent fuel economy (2.5L I4).
I bought my Fusion S on March 18th and it is now August 3rd. I have put over 9,500 miles on it with an average MPG of 35.4 MPG over that time
